name: The Unknown Ahead
description:
NOTE : This Game Contains Horror Elements That May NOT Suit Everyone !

NEEDS A GOOD PC ! Some areas of the map may be crowded by entities and assets

It also may contain Bugs , and Glitches since it was made in a very short period of time and it is really barebones. But we will fix them when we see them and we are really sorry if you encounter issues ... it's just that no comfortable time was available  . also feedback is great helping is patching the game ! New Levels are planned for the future because I was not able to squeeze the whole story in time. 

Made For The marathon Jam  2021 

WAKE UP ! Where are you ? You were enjoying your life a few hours ago ... What happened ? All kinds of creatures want you dead now ... WHY !? You sure likely will leave with more questions than answers 

THANKS TO :

Horror engine - tansuergene

Abandoned mansion - Devton

Sfx  - Freesounds.org

Polar Sci-fi facility - Julio Juarez

MADE USING UNREAL ENGINE 4
